title: Best of The Herd: 7/30/20
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 7/30/20
description:
Colin comments on Patrick Mahomes not being ranked the top QB, LeBron James is driven-- not anti-social, there's no need to baby Zion Williamson, and the Astros are better off keeping their mouths shut.

Guest: Fox Sports Radio host Chris Broussard
